${ModID}:OldRod.NAME: Old Rod
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, shuffle 2 #y${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:FiberglassRod.NAME: Fiberglass Rod
${ModID}:FiberglassRod.FLAVOR: Plop!... Now to wait some more.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Old Rod. At the start of each turn, shuffle 2 #y${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:WornCoat.NAME: Worn Coat
${ModID}:WornCoat.FLAVOR: A reminder to take it easy sometimes.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #y${ModID}:Fish enters your discard pile, gain 6 Block.

${ModID}:BoxOfCrayons.NAME: Box of Crayons
${ModID}:BoxOfCrayons.FLAVOR: Only a couple of them still have their wrappers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard #b3 cards, draw #b1 card.
